news.content:
There have been many questions in the community about the plan around the ThreeFold Token.

Please take a look at this post and provide your comments, questions, and feedback.

We hope you see what we see… Now’s the time to buy TFT. If you need some help getting TFT on BSC, please see the forum post here. And as always, we’re here to help!
news.excerpt: Sharing some of the latest tokenomics updates that will go live with Grid 3.0. A sustainable development plan for TFT.

previous.title: TFT is more accessible; now available via PancakeSwap and a BTC Integration on ThreeFold Connect
previous.excerpt: Today, the bridge to BSC is live, making TFT available on PancakeSwap! And anyone can now buy TFT with BTC directly on the ThreeFold Connect app.
